metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The F5 Networks solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest F5 Network firewall logs into Microsoft Sentinel, using the Common Event Format (CEF) for Security Monitoring.

  1. F5 Networks via AMA - This data connector helps in ingesting F5 Networks logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent here. Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector.

  2. F5 Networks via Legacy Agent - This data connector helps in ingesting F5 Networks logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

NOTE: Microsoft recommends installation of F5 Networks via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by Aug 31, 2024, and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost more details.

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
